quoteFirst: In addition, the men did all that was possible to make the foe believe that an attack on the Redoubt was imminent; bayonets were shown over the parapet, dummies were moved about, the men shouted, and pipes and bugles sounded the charge. This demonstration caused the Germans[12] to man their parapet, and as our artillery deluged their front trenches with shrapnel
quoteLast: , it was believed[13] that heavy losses had been inflicted on the garrison. During the third and fourth days of the bombardment, the reply of the German artillery became more rapid and intense.

quoteLast: , and then said, "Général, depuis cinq minutes votre auréole baisse." Boulanger went out by a side door, leaving his friends--disappointed and furious--to announce to the waiting crowd that the General had gone home.
